column5: Engaging in imagery and progressive muscle relaxation can lower stress. These techniques activate the parasympathetic nervous system#Comma which is responsible for the relaxation response.

column2: WHAT NOT TO DO WHEN MANAGING STRESS
column5: When managing stress#Comma it's important to avoid certain actions. Here are four things to avoid:#Newline            1. Embrace stress in your environment: Manage your surroundings by avoiding stress-inducing people and situations.#Newline            2. Overload your to-do list: Practice time management and allow flexibility for unforeseen obstacles.#Newline            3. Neglect self-care: Prioritize self-care routines for your physical and mental well-being.#Newline            4. Lose hope: Maintain a positive mindset and belief in your ability to overcome stressors.

column2: WHEN TO SEE A DOCTOR FOR STRESS
column5: If you notice changes like insomnia#Comma headaches#Comma chest pains#Comma or thoughts of depression#Comma consider consulting a health professional. Stress affects people differently#Comma and seeking help is important for your well-being.

Stress management techniques can have a profound impact on your life. From health and work to relationships#Comma self-care practices can lead to reduced stress#Comma improved sleep#Comma and overall well-being.
